Title: "Time compression" feature
Description:
Terminal inactivity won't last longer than 5 seconds during playback even if the real pause lasted much longer.

It makes less dynamic asciicasts enjoyable, preventing viewer from getting bored. Waiting for some long command to return won't hurt that much anymore.

This feature is enabled by default. You can disable it for particular asciicast by editing its title/description (the option is in the same form).
